title: Belkin 3-in-1 Wireless Charger - Fast Wireless Charging Stand for Apple iPhone, Apple Watch & AirPods - iPhone Case Compatible Qi Charger - Wireless Charging Station For Multiple Devices - White
features: 3-IN-1 CHARGER: Power your Apple iPhone & other devices with the Belkin 3-in-1 wireless Apple charging station. Charge multiple devices, including all Qi compatible iPhones, Apple Watches & AirPods
FAST WIRELESS CHARGING STATION: The Belkin 3-in-1 phone charger is compatible with Qi-enabled Apple iPhones with charging speeds up to 7.5W. Apple Watch and Apple AirPods charge at 5W
WORRY FREE WIRELESS CHARGER: Convenient phone stand design and integrated LED lights indicate charging status of your Apple iPhone, Apple Watch & AirPods
SLEEK AND STYLISH: The compact design of this wireless charger will look great on your nightstand or home office, and is compatible with most iPhone cases

2-YEAR WARRANTY: The charging station comes with a 2-year limited warranty. The wireless charger is Qi Certified for safety, and compatible with most phone cases so you can rest assured that your iPhone and other Apple devices are safe and protected
description: The Belkin MagSafe 3-in-1 Wireless Charging Pad is the perfect way to keep your devices charged and ready to go. Say goodbye to fumbling with charging cords and lightning cables, with three wireless charging modules this iPhone charger can power your Apple iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirPods all at the same time.

The elegant design and sleek black finish of Belkinâ€™s Wireless Charging Pad makes it an ideal iPhone and Apple Watch charger for any home or office space. The durable rubberized pad provides stability while docking and undocking your iPhone, Apple Watch and AirPods. While the integrated LED indicator lights show the charging status of each device. White light confirms active wireless charging, while an amber light indicates an error has occurred with charging.

Featuring Qi technology that delivers safe power transfer up to 7.5 watts for a fast wireless charging experience. The phone charger works with iPhone SE, iPhone 8, iPhone X, iPhone 11, iPhone 12, iPhone 13 & iPhone 14 including all standard, Plus, Pro, Pro Max and Mini models, as well as Qi-enabled phones from Samsung, Google, and more. Keep all your devices powered up and organized with the Belkin 3-in-1 Wireless Charger.
